meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of salmon in color or taste.
meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky a salmony hue.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a lovely salmony shade.
meanings.sent3: The salmony walls of the restaurant made everyone crave seafood.
meanings.sent4: The salmony glow of the fire warmed our hearts.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed red and orange to create a beautiful salmony color.
